decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (SBD/16/1997/LP, SBD/16/1997/P1, SBD/16/1997/P2, SBD/16/1997/P4, SBD/15/WICKES/001 received on 05/08/2016. SBD/16/1997/P3 and 01 received on 23/09/2016. 02.1 and 02.2 received on 30/09/2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - Prior to the first beneficial use of the development, a Delivery and Servicing Plan shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority. The development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details.

Condition : 4 - The delivery area shown on the approved plans shall be reserved for its designated use and kept clear from all other materials, including the parking of non-delivery vehicles, at all times.
Condition : 5 - No deliveries shall be loaded or unloaded on the public highway and no materials are to be placed or stored on the public highway at any time.
description: External alterations to existing retail (Class A1) unit; creation of outdoor project centre; re-configured car parking layout; and associated works.
